Articles.Content: Unfortunately, There is a game glitch and the transports suddenly get teleported 500 kilometers below the surface of the planet and blow up. Me and my friends' hill.
The transport explosion created a cavern. The ground falls down together with the hill.
The hill is made out of voxel terrain. The hill stays where it is. Me and my friends’ hill!

But voxels are inverted. You're buried inside.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-16T14:17:54Z" title="08/16/2018 02:17  PM" data-short="5 yr">August 16, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

> 
> 
> On 8/2/2018 at 3:05 PM, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> I use﻿﻿﻿ ReverseTim﻿eWarp﻿C﻿ontinued.
>
You reverse too far and the "Continued" falls off. I call it a hill and sit on top of it.
A thunderstorm begins, After a lightning nobody sits on the top of the hill.
Me and my friends walk on the top of the hill. Our hill.

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> Me and my friends walk on the top of the hill.
> 

A typical beginning of a horror film.

Bye, friends...

I perform a powered landing on top of the hill, exit my craft, plant a flag, give a speech about peace, set up a couple of scientific experiments, create a named quicksave that I proceed to burn 5 DVD copies of and hide all over the world, and then return to game and liftoff, leaving behind the descent stage. 

My hill of exploration!

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-18T20:38:10Z" title="08/18/2018 08:38  PM" data-short="5 yr">August 18, 2018</time> by 53miner53**

I take the hill. I delete the quicksave. me, [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/), and [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)'s hill. BLEEPITYBLEEPITYBLEEP

You have deleted your quicksave.  

Too bad. A local blackout.
Someone fixes the Power Plant, and guards it with a bunch of Onix (hope that's okay with Minmus Derp). Our hill-planet.
I help defend our hill by building an indestructible dome around our hill.
(2 days without coincidences.)
Be a friend! Unfollow [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/)!
Ok, unfollowed myself.

> 
> 
> 14 hours ago, TeslaPenguin1 said:
> 
> 
> I help defend our hill by building an indestructible dome around our hill.
> 

I crash kerbol into your dome and hill. I create a new hill, as the last one was destroyed.
The dome is indestructible. My hill. HEHEHE! Kerbol is the worse for wear. It rebounds and flies into your new hill, which has no such protection.
Santa gets to the trio's hill and leaves a sack with gifts there.

I got to the trio's hill. Busted them with four tanks. Hill conquered and two artilleries, two Anti-Aircraft cannons, a bucket ladder truck, a mobile crane and...

![maxresdefault.jpg](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/urbx1qXKvxQ/maxresdefault.jpg)

ACA P-50 siren. Rotates, sounds dual tone (Two tones at the same time) and produces 138dB at 100ft. And...

![6f5daafc8-mobile.jpeg](https://dudo6el28sqqp.cloudfront.net/gothamistgallery/2016/3/22/6f5daafc8-mobile.jpeg)

Chrysler-Bell Victory siren. Conducts 138dB at 100ft. Loudest siren, able to turn mist into rain and ignite fires as of several reports during testing.

Sirens are mounted side-by-side and due to lacking of power lines, P-50 runs on arrays of solar panels, a huge battery and DC motor in place of AC. Tanks, Artilleries and AAs keeps an eye of both sirens. So far the noisiest and wailious hill.

And oh, one more. Set up a militiary base with a runway long enough to support a C-5M Super Galaxy.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-21T10:32:40Z" title="08/21/2018 10:32  AM" data-short="5 yr">August 21, 2018</time> by FahmiRBLXian**
  
More stuff.
the tanks cannot land, as there is a circumplanetary shield. My and my friend’s hill.
Friendly Santa gets to the hill, passes the circumplanetary shield recognizing him as a friendly target, leaves a sack with gifts and gets away.
<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">The gifts include several highpower nuclear fusion warheads. Our hill.</font>

Confused Santa gets to the hill again and asks: "Did you see a sack with gifts here? I left one."

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-21T14:52:35Z" title="08/21/2018 02:52  PM" data-short="5 yr">August 21, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**
